title: Robot Actions
text:
When the protagonist is next to a robot, he can push it.
Each time a robot is pushed, it will move forward one square in the direction of the push.
Each square moved will subtract one from the allotted number of <color=#FF423F>Moves</color>.

title: King Bot
text:
Monitor the situation carefully as you move the <color=#FF423F>King Bot</color>.
Once the <color=#FF423F>King Bot</color> reaches the <color=#FF423F>Backdoor</color>, the challenge is complete.

title: Restricted Zone
text:
Red <color=#FF423F>Restricted Zones</color> are contaminated or damaged and cannot be crossed.
Only <color=#FF423F>Combat Drones</color> can fly over these special areas.

title: Collecting Gold Coins
text: There are <color=#FF423F>Gold Coins</color> on the field. Move any robot to a coin's space to collect it. Collect coins to clear additional challenges.

title: Robot Actions
text:
When the protagonist is next to a robot, he can push it.
Each time a robot is pushed, it will move forward one square in the direction of the push.
Each square moved will subtract one from the allotted number of <color=#FF423F>Moves</color>.

title: King Bot
text:
Monitor the situation carefully as you move the <color=#FF423F>King Bot</color>.
Once the <color=#FF423F>King Bot</color> reaches the <color=#FF423F>Backdoor</color>, the challenge is complete.

title: Restricted Zone
text:
Red <color=#FF423F>Restricted Zones</color> are contaminated or damaged and cannot be crossed.
Only <color=#FF423F>Combat Drones</color> can fly over these special areas.

title: Collecting Gold Coins
text: There are <color=#FF423F>Gold Coins</color> on the field. Move any robot to a coin's space to collect it. Collect coins to clear additional challenges.

title: Firewall
text: It's an <color=#FF423F>obstacle</color> blocking the challenger's path!

title: Firewall
text: This is the insurmountable <color=#FF423F>Firewall</color> that <color=#FF423F>blocks the advance of all robots</color>!

title: Start
text: How will the challenger overcome this? Stay tuned and find out!

title: Firewall
text:
<color=#FF423F>Firewalls</color> cannot be crossed by any robot.
You will need to go around <color=#FF423F>Firewalls</color> in order to proceed.

title: Watch Out for Obstacles
text: If a square is occupied by a Firewall or another robot, <color=#FF423F>the protagonist and other robots cannot enter</color>. Plan your route carefully.

title: Robot Actions
text:
When the protagonist is next to a robot, he can push it.
Each time a robot is pushed, it will move forward one square in the direction of the push.
Each square moved will subtract one from the allotted number of <color=#FF423F>Moves</color>.

title: King Bot
text:
Monitor the situation carefully as you move the <color=#FF423F>King Bot</color>.
Once the <color=#FF423F>King Bot</color> reaches the <color=#FF423F>Backdoor</color>, the challenge is complete.

title: Restricted Zone
text:
Red <color=#FF423F>Restricted Zones</color> are contaminated or damaged and cannot be crossed.
Only <color=#FF423F>Combat Drones</color> can fly over these special areas.

title: Collecting Gold Coins
text: There are <color=#FF423F>Gold Coins</color> on the field. Move any robot to a coin's space to collect it. Collect coins to clear additional challenges.

title: Electrolock Barrier
text:
What's this? A new obstacle has appeared!
It's the <color=#FF423F>Electrolock Barrier</color>! Shocking!

title: Self-Destruct Bot
text:
However, the challengers also have a new tool in their arsenal!
It's the <color=#FF423F>Self-Destruct Bot</color>!

title: Self-Destruct Bot
text: It may be small, but it packs a punch! It can <color=#FF423F>self-destruct to destroy Electrolock Barriers</color>!

title: Self-Destruct Bot
text: But <color=#FF423F>you've only got one shot</color>! You need to time your self-destructs carefully, or you'll run out of bots!

title: Start
text: Will our challenger be able to make use of this new item?

title: Electrolock Barrier
text:
<color=#FF423F>Electrolock Barriers</color> cannot be crossed by any robot.
But they <color=#FF423F>can be destroyed</color> with <color=#FF423F>Self-Destruct Bots</color>.

title: Self-Destruct Bot
text:
<color=#FF423F>Self-Destruct Bots</color> can be used to destroy <color=#FF423F>Electrolock Barriers</color>.
Move it to the square of the barrier you want to destroy, and it will automatically explode.
<color=#FF423F>Self-Destruct Bots can only be used once.
Once they have exploded, they won't come back</color>.

title: Robot Actions
text:
When the protagonist is next to a robot, he can push it.
Each time a robot is pushed, it will move forward one square in the direction of the push.
Each square moved will subtract one from the allotted number of <color=#FF423F>Moves</color>.

title: King Bot
text:
Monitor the situation carefully as you move the <color=#FF423F>King Bot</color>.
Once the <color=#FF423F>King Bot</color> reaches the <color=#FF423F>Backdoor</color>, the challenge is complete.

title: Collecting Gold Coins
text: There are <color=#FF423F>Gold Coins</color> on the field. Move any robot to a coin's space to collect it. Collect coins to clear additional challenges.

title: Restricted Zone
text:
Red <color=#FF423F>Restricted Zones</color> are contaminated or damaged and cannot be crossed.
Only <color=#FF423F>Combat Drones</color> can fly over these special areas.

title: Firewall
text:
<color=#FF423F>Firewalls</color> cannot be crossed by any robot.
You will need to go around <color=#FF423F>Firewalls</color> in order to proceed.

title: Defeating Enemies
text:
You can <color=#FF423F>activate an attack</color> that <color=#FF423F>destroys Berserk Bots</color> by simply pushing a <color=#FF423F>Combat Drone, King Bot, or Self-Destruct Bot</color> onto their squares.
Try to think of ways to take Berserk Bots down and clear bonus challenges.

title: Berserk Bot
text:
<color=#FF423F>Berserk Bots</color> have been hacked, and their orders were overwritten to <color=#FF423F>destroy the King Bot</color>.
<color=#FF423F>If the King Bot is destroyed, you will fail the challenge</color>, so be sure to protect the King Bot.

title: Berserk Bot
text:
<color=#FF423F>Berserk Bots</color> have an attack range of 2 squares in front.
Any robot that enters their attack range will be destroyed.
The range is marked with red squares, so be careful.
The dotted line shows the Berserk Bot's movement route.

title: Defeating Enemies
text:
You can <color=#FF423F>activate an attack</color> that <color=#FF423F>destroys Berserk Bots</color> by simply pushing a <color=#FF423F>Combat Drone, King Bot, or Self-Destruct Bot</color> onto their squares.
Try to think of ways to take Berserk Bots down and clear bonus challenges.

text:
<color=#FF423F>Self-Destruct Bots</color> can be used to destroy <color=#FF423F>Electrolock Barriers</color>.
Move it to the square of the barrier you want to destroy, and it will automatically explode.
<color=#FF423F>Self-Destruct Bots can only be used once.
Once they have exploded, they won't come back</color>.

title: Advanced Tutorial
text:
<color=#FF423F>Berserk Bots</color> have been programmed to <color=#FF423F>destroy the King Bot</color>.
When the <color=#FF423F>King Bot</color> moves, the <color=#FF423F>Berserk Bots</color> will automatically adjust their route.
Use this to your advantage to defeat the enemies.

text:

Use this to your advantage to complete the challenge.

title: Shop Closing Conditions
text: Each work shift has a set <color=#FF423F>time limit</color> and a set number of customers you can serve. <color=#FF423F>Your shift will end when time is up or when all customers have been served</color>, so try to serve as many customers as possible in the shortest amount of time.

title: Serving Shaved Ice
text: Check the <color=#FF423F>customer's order</color>, which displays above their heads, and quickly combine ingredients to make their desired shaved ice. Drag the shaved ice to the customer's location in order to serve.

title: Time Limit
text: If you don't serve the shaved ice <color=#FF423F>within the time limit</color>, the customer will get angry and leave. If a customer requests more than one shaved ice, the timer will reset when a correct shaved ice is served.

title: Customer Satisfaction
text: Quickly and accurately serving shaved ice orders will improve the shop's <color=#FF423F>customer satisfaction rating</color>. <color=#FF423F>1 customer satisfaction point</color> will convert to 20 points at the end of the shift.

title: Throwing Away Shaved Ice
text: Throw away shaved ice you've created by dragging it to the trash can.

title: Business Goals
text: The goal of the shaved ice shop is to have the highest sales possible to bring in profit. Serve as much shaved ice as you can to keep the business booming!

title: Friends' Orders
text: After the end of your shift, your accomplices may also stop by the shaved ice stand. Their orders will count toward your total score, so be sure to serve them the shaved ice they want.

title: Shop Closing Conditions
text: In Endless Mode, you have unlimited time and customers. However, if you fail too many orders, your shift will end.

title: Serving Shaved Ice
text: Check the <color=#FF423F>customer's order</color>, which displays above their heads, and quickly combine ingredients to make their desired shaved ice. Drag the shaved ice to the customer's location in order to serve.

title: Time Limit
text: If you don't serve the shaved ice <color=#FF423F>within the time limit</color>, the customer will get angry and leave. If a customer requests more than one shaved ice, the timer will reset when a correct shaved ice is served.

title: Customer Satisfaction
text: Quickly and accurately serving shaved ice orders will improve the shop's <color=#FF423F>customer satisfaction rating</color>. <color=#FF423F>1 customer satisfaction point</color> will convert to 20 points at the end of the shift.

title: Throwing Away Shaved Ice
text: Throw away shaved ice you've created by dragging it to the trash can.

title: Business Goals
text: The goal of the shaved ice shop is to have the highest sales possible to bring in profit. Serve as much shaved ice as you can to keep the business booming!

title: Friends' Orders
text: Accomplices will not visit the shop in endless mode.

title: Topping
text:
You can now add toppings to shaved ice.
Do your best to ensure customer orders are fulfilled correctly!

title: Decorations
text:
You can now add decorations to your shaved ice.
Do your best to ensure customer orders are fulfilled correctly!

title: Shooting Controls
text:
PC: Use the <color=#FF423F>mouse</color> to aim, <color=#FF423F>left click</color> to fire a single shot, and <color=#FF423F>hold down left click</color> to fire continuously.
Gamepad: Use the <color=#FF423F>Left Stick</color> to aim, <color=#FF423F>R2/RT</color> to fire a single shot, and hold down R2/RT to fire continously.

title: Destroying Targets
text:
When you hit a target, the number of hits required to destroy it will be displayed underneath.
When the gauge reaches 0, the target will be destroyed.
One water shot usually deals <color=#FF423F>1</color> point of damage, but there are various ways to increase the damage.

title: Refilling Water
text:
When your water runs out, you will be unable to fire.
<color=#FF423F>Release the fire button</color> to automatically refill water over time.

title: Current Wave
text:
Each stage has multiple waves, and the current wave number is displayed at the top.
When time runs out, all regular tagets will automatically disappear, and a new wave of targets will appear.

title: Combo Points
text:
Hitting targets will build up combo points, and when your combo gets higher, you will earn more points for defeating targets.
You can get up to <color=#FF423F>3x</color> points with a combo of <color=#FF423F>400</color> or more.
Your combo will be broken if you do not hit a target.

title: Explosive Barrel
text:
Explosive barrels will appear on this stage.
When destroyed, they will deal heavy damage to surrounding targets.

title: Octopus
text:
An octopus will appear on this stage.
When destroyed, it emits a plume of black smoke that obscures your view.

title: Shooting Star
text:
Shooting stars will appear in this stage.
They move fast, but if destroyed they will award a large amount of points.

title: Pirate Captain
text:
A Pirate Captain will appear in this stage.
When defeated, he will drop a treasure chest. Shoot the treasure quickly to earn a large amount of points.

title: Kraken
text:
A Kraken will appear in this stage.
It will appear when you have earned <color=#FF423F>800</color> points.
When defeated, it awards a large amount of points and destroys all other targets onscreen.

title: Endless Mode
text: In Endless Mode, there is no limit to the number of waves, and the targets are changed for each wave. The game will not end until you fail to meet a stage's requirements.

title: Support Skills
text:
You can activate a support skill by tapping your teammate's icon on the bottom right.
After using a skill, it will enter cooldown, and can be activated again once the cooldown is complete.

title: Controls
text:
PC: Use the <color=#FF423F>mouse</color> to aim, <color=#FF423F>left click</color> to fire a single shot, and <color=#FF423F>hold down left click</color> to fire continuously.
Gamepad: Use the <color=#FF423F>Left Stick</color> to aim, <color=#FF423F>R2/RT</color> to fire a single shot, and hold down R2/RT to fire continuously.
Mobile devices: <color=#FF423F>Touch the screen</color> to aim and fire directly at targets. Switch to control stick mode to use the stick to aim.

title: Destroying Targets
text:
When you hit a target, the number of hits required to destroy it will be displayed underneath.
When the gauge reaches 0, the target will be destroyed.
Normally, <color=#FF423F>One shot deals 1</color> point of damage, but there are various ways to increase the damage.

title: Reloading
text:
When you run out of shots, you will be unable to fire.
<color=#FF423F>Release the fire button</color> to automatically reload over time.

title: Current Wave
text:
Each stage has multiple waves, and the current wave number is displayed at the top.
When time runs out, all regular targets will automatically disappear, and a new wave of targets will appear.

title: Combo Points
text:
Hitting targets will build up combo points, and when your combo gets higher, you will earn more points for defeating targets.
You can get up to <color=#FF423F>3x</color> points with a combo of <color=#FF423F>400</color> or more.
Your combo will be broken if you do not hit a target.

title: Support Skills
text:
You can activate a support skill by tapping your teammate's icon on the bottom right.
After using a skill, it will enter cooldown, and can be activated again once the cooldown is complete.

title: Dango Demon
text:
Dango Demons will appear on this stage.
When defeated, they will split into 3 demons.

title: Exorcising Firecrackers
text:
Exorcising Firecrackers will appear on this stage.
When destroyed, they will deal heavy damage to surrounding targets.

title: Dragon Carp
text:
Dragon Carp will appear on this stage.
When defeated, it emits a plume of black smoke that obscures your view.

title: Pack Rat
text:
Pack Rats will appear on this stage.
When defeated, they will drop Exorcising Firecrackers.
When destroyed, they will deal heavy damage to surrounding targets.

title: Cat Burglar
text:
Cat Burglars will appear in this stage.
They move fast, but if destroyed they will award a large amount of points.

title: Yearbeast Minions
text:
Yearbeast Minions will appear in this stage.
When defeated, they will drop Exorcising Firecrackers.

title: Yearbeast
text: A Yearbeast will appear in this stage. It will appear when you have earned <color=#FF423F>800</color> points. When defeated, it awards a large amount of points and destroys all other targets onscreen. 3 Yearbeast Minions will appear along with the Yearbeast. The Yearbeast will be immune to damage until the minions have been defeated.

title: Endless
text: In Endless Mode, there is no limit to the number of waves, and the targets are changed for each wave. The game will not end until you fail to meet a stage's requirements.
